[93mdiseases[0m, but the [93misoform[0m-[93mspecific[0m [93meffects[0m [93mremain[0m [93mpoorly[0m [93munderstood[0m. [93mHypochlorous[0m [93macid[0m ([93mHOCl[0m), [93mgenerated[0m by the [93menzyme[0m [93mmyeloperoxidase[0m ([93mMPO[0m) [93mtargets[0m [93mextracellular[0m [93mmatrix[0m [93mproteins[0m during [93minflammatory[0m [93mprocesses[0m. [93mHowever[0m, the [93mdifferential[0m [93msusceptibility[0m and [93mfunctional[0m [93mconsequences[0m in [93mspecific[0m [93mTE[0m [93misoforms[0m are [93munknown[0m. [93mMethods[0m: [93mWe[0m [95minvestigated[0m the [93meffects[0m of [93mHOCl[0m and [93mMPO[0m-[93mderived[0m [93moxidants[0m on [93mtwo[0m [93mhuman[0m [93mTE[0m [93misoforms[0m, [93mTE2[0m and [93mTE6[0m. [93mOxidative[0m [93mmodifications[0m were [93manalyzed[0m [93musing[0m [93mhigh[0m-[93mresolution[0m [93mLC[0m-[93mMS[0m/[93mMS[0m, with [93msite[0m-[93mspecific[0m [93midentification[0m of [93mchlorinated[0m [93mtyrosines[0m and [93moxidized[0m [93mcysteine[0m [93mresidues[0m. [93mFunctional[0m [93mconsequences[0m were [93massessed[0m [93musing[0m [93mturbidity[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mcoacervation[0m [93massays[0m. [93mResults[0m: [93mTE2[0m [93mexhibited[0m [93mchlorination[0m at [93mmultiple[0m [93mtyrosine[0m [93mresidues[0m, [93mparticularly[0m [93m3[0m,[93m5[0m-[93mdichlorotyrosine[0m, while [93mshowing[0m [93mminimal[0m [93mcysteine[0m [93moxidation[0m. In [93mcontrast[0m, [93mTE6[0m was [93mmore[0m [93moxidised[0m at its [93msingle[0m [93mdisulfide[0m [93mbond[0m, [93mresulting[0m in [93mirreversible[0m [93msulfonic[0m [93macid[0m [93mformation[0m. These [93misoform[0m-[93mspecific[0m [93mpatterns[0m [93mtranslated[0m into [93mfunctional[0m [93mdifferences[0m: [93mTE2[0m [93mdemonstrated[0m [93menhanced[0m [93mcoacervation[0m , [93mwhereas[0m [93mTE6[0m [93mshowed[0m [93mreduced[0m [93massembly[0m [93mcapacity[0m, [93mconsistent[0m with [93mstructural[0m [93mdestabilization[0m. [93mConclusion[0m: [93mHOCl[0m and [93mMPO[0m-[93mderived[0m [93moxidants[0m [93minduce[0m [93mdistinct[0m [93mmodifications[0m in [93mtropoelastin[0m [93misoforms[0m, [93mresulting[0m in [93mdivergent[0m [93meffects[0m on [93mprotein[0m [93mself[0m-[93massembly[0m. These [93mfindings[0m [93mhighlight[0m the [93mimportance[0m of [93misoform[0m [93mcontext[0m in [93mextracellular[0m [93mmatrix[0m [93mremodeling[0m under [93moxidative[0m [93mstress[0m and [93mmay[0m [93mhave[0m [93mimplications[0m for [93mvascular[0m [93mpathologies[0m.

The [93mdouble[0m [93minsertion[0m [93mcomplex[0m [93mundergoes[0m [93mC[0m-[93mC[0m [93mbond[0m [93mformation[0m to [93mafford[0m [93m1[0m,[93m2[0m-[93mphenylenediamine[0m, [93machieving[0m a ([93m4[0m + [93m1[0m + [93m1[0m) [93mcycloaddition[0m of [93m1[0m,[93m3[0m-[93mdienes[0m and [93misocyanides[0m [93mvia[0m a [93mstoichiometric[0m [93mredox[0m [93mprocess[0m and [93minsertion[0m on [93mgallium[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93mdemonstrates[0m a [93mproof[0m-of-[93mconcept[0m for the [93mformal[0m [93mtwo[0m-[93melectron[0m [93mredox[0m [93mprocesses[0m of [93mgroup[0m [93m13[0m [93melements[0m for [93morganic[0m [93msynthesis[0m [93menabled[0m by the [93minvolvement[0m of [93mradical[0m [93mintermediates[0m.

- [93mMitigation[0m [93mPotential[0m of [93mbio[0m-[93mfabricated[0m [93mselenium[0m [93mnanoparticles[0m on [93marsenic[0m [93minduced[0m [93mstress[0m in [93mmorpho[0m-[93mphysiological[0m [93mgrowth[0m of [93mrice[0m ([93mOryza[0m [93msativa[0m [93mL[0m.) [93mseedlings[0m.: [93mArsenic[0m (As) is a [93mhighly[0m [93mtoxic[0m [93mmetalloid[0m that [93mpresents[0m a [93mmajor[0m [93menvironmental[0m [93mhazard[0m. [93mExtensive[0m [93mcontamination[0m of [93magricultural[0m [93msoils[0m by As is a [93mglobal[0m [93mconcern[0m, [93mnecessitating[0m the [93mdevelopment[0m of [93meffective[0m and [93mcost[0m-[93mefficient[0m [93mstrategies[0m to [93mmitigate[0m its [93mimpact[0m on [93mfood[0m [93msafety[0m. [93mAlthough[0m [93mselenium[0m ([93mSe[0m) [93mhas[0m been [93mrecognized[0m for its [93mantagonistic[0m [93minteractions[0m with As, the [93mpotential[0m of [93mselenium[0m [93mnanoparticles[0m ([93mSeNPs[0m) in [93mmitigating[0m As [93mtoxicity[0m [93mremains[0m [93munderexplored[0m. In this [93mstudy[0m, [93mbiocompatible[0m [93mSeNPs[0m were [93msynthesized[0m [93mvia[0m a [93mgreen[0m [93mapproach[0m [93musing[0m [93mVitis[0m [93mvinifera[0m [93mraisin[0m [93mextract[0m and [93mapplied[0m to [93mrice[0m ([93mOryza[0m [93msativa[0m [93mL[0m.) [93mseedlings[0m ([93mHUR[0m-[93m105[0m) through [93mpriming[0m, [93mco[0m-[93mapplication[0m, and [93mfoliar[0m [93mspraying[0m under As [93mstress[0m. [93mArsenic[0m [93mexposure[0m [93msignificantly[0m ([93mp[0m ≤ [93m0[0m.[93m01[0m) [93mimpaired[0m [93mseedling[0m [93mgrowth[0m by [93mdisturbing[0m [93mnutrient[0m [93mhomeostasis[0m, [93mreducing[0m [93mchlorophyll[0m [93mbiosynthesis[0m, and [93mweakening[0m [93mmembrane[0m [93mstability[0m. [93mApplication[0m of [93mSeNPs[0m, [93mparticularly[0m at [93m25[0m [93mμM[0m [93mfoliar[0m [93mconcentration[0m, [93msubstantially[0m [93malleviated[0m these [93meffects[0m by [93menhancing[0m [93mantioxidant[0m [93menzyme[0m [93mactivity[0m, [93mstimulating[0m [93msecondary[0m [93mmetabolite[0m [93mproduction[0m, and [93mimproving[0m [93mphotosynthetic[0m [93mefficiency[0m. [93mBiochemical[0m [93manalyses[0m [93mrevealed[0m [93mpronounced[0m [93mincreases[0m in [93mchlorophyll[0m ([93m50[0m%), [93mcarbohydrate[0m ([93m45[0m%), [93msoluble[0m [93mprotein[0m ([93m48[0m%), and [93mfree[0m [93mamino[0m [93macid[0m ([93m44[0m%) [93mcontents[0m, [93malongside[0m a [93m38[0m% [93menhancement[0m in [93mmembrane[0m [93mstability[0m [93mindex[0m. These [93mfindings[0m [93mindicate[0m that [93mSeNPs[0m [93mserves[0m as an [93meffective[0m [93mreactive[0m [93moxygen[0m [93mspecies[0m ([93mROS[0m) [93mquencher[0m, [93mmitigates[0m As-[93minduced[0m [93moxidative[0m [93mdamage[0m by [93mreinforcing[0m [93mredox[0m [93mhomeostasis[0m and [93mmetabolic[0m [93mactivity[0m. The [93mstudy[0m [93munderscores[0m the [93mpotential[0m of [93mSeNPs[0m as a [93mnanotechnological[0m [93mintervention[0m to [93menhance[0m [93mstress[0m [93mresilience[0m in [93mrice[0m, while [93mhighlighting[0m the [93mnecessity[0m of [93mfield[0m-[93mscale[0m [93mevaluations[0m to [93mestablish[0m [93mdose[0m [93moptimization[0m and [93mlong[0m-[93mterm[0m [93mapplicability[0m under [93mvariable[0m As [93mconditions[0m.

- [93mIntratumoral[0m [93mSynthesis[0m of [93mTwo[0m-[93mPhoton[0m [93mNIR[0m-[93mI[0m [93mActivated[0m [93mPhotosensitizer[0m [93mUndergoing[0m [93mOxygen[0m-[93mFree[0m [93mPhoto[0m-[93mRedox[0m [93mCycle[0m for [93mHypoxic[0m [93mTumor[0m [93mPhototherapy[0m.: The [92mdesign[0m of [93mNIR[0m-[93mI[0m [93mactivated[0m [93moxygen[0m-[93mindependent[0m [93mphotosensitizers[0m with [93moptimal[0m [93mdelivery[0m [93mefficiency[0m [93mholds[0m [93mgreat[0m [93mpromise[0m in [93mefficient[0m [93mphotodynamic[0m [93mtherapy[0m of [93mdeep[0m-[93mseated[0m [93mhypoxic[0m [93mtumors[0m. [93mHerein[0m, by [93mfabricating[0m [93mintratumoral[0m [93msynthetic[0m [93mtherapeutic[0m [92msystem[0m, the [93msilenced[0m [93mprodrug[0m [93mAICST[0m are [93mselectively[0m and [93mspontaneously[0m [93mtransformed[0m into [93mAICST[0m-SO [93m3[0m with [93mNIR[0m-[93mI[0m [93mabsorption[0m, which [93munderwent[0m [93moxygen[0m-[93mfree[0m [93mphoto[0m-[93mredox[0m [93mcycle[0m for [93mhypoxic[0m [93mtumor[0m [93mphototherapy[0m. The [93mprodrug[0m [93mAICST[0m [93mbased[0m on [93mD[0m-[93mπ[0m-A [93mstructure[0m with a [93mtwo[0m-[93mphoton[0m [93mmoiety[0m [93mcoumarin[0m as [93mdonor[0m ([93mD[0m), [93mC[0m═[93mC[0m [93mbond[0m as [93mπ[0m [93mbridge[0m, and [93mindole[0m [93mderivative[0m as [93melectron[0m [93macceptor[0m (A) [93mresponded[0m to the [93mintracellular[0m [93moverexpressed[0m SO [93m3[0m [93m2[0m- to [93myield[0m [93mphotosensitizer[0m [93mAICST[0m-SO [93m3[0m . The [93mphoto[0m-[93mexcited[0m [93mAICST[0m-SO [93m3[0m [93mgenerated[0m [93mcharge[0m [93mseparation[0m [93mspecies[0m, [93mwherein[0m the [93mstrong[0m [93moxidized[0m [93mmoiety[0m [93mwould[0m [93mcapture[0m [93melectron[0m from [93mwater[0m to [93mgenerate[0m [93mcytotoxic[0m [93mhydroxyl[0m [93mradical[0m ([93mOH[0m•), and the [93manionic[0m [93mradicals[0m [93mtransferred[0m [93melectrons[0m to [93mpyruvic[0m [93macid[0m to [93maccomplish[0m the [93mphoto[0m-[93mredox[0m [93mcycle[0m. In [93mvitro[0m [93mcellular[0m [93mexperiments[0m [93mconfirmed[0m the [93mintracellular[0m [93msynthesis[0m of [93mAICST[0m-SO [93m3[0m and the [93mefficient[0m [93mcancer[0m [93mcells[0m [93mkilling[0m [93mcapability[0m. In [93mvivo[0m [93mmouse[0m [92mmodel[0m [93mexperiments[0m [93mrevealed[0m that, under the [93m800[0m [93mnm[0m [93mirradiation[0m, the [93mtumor[0m [93mcan[0m [93malmost[0m be [93mcompletely[0m [93mablated[0m by the [93mprodrug[0m [93mAICST[0m, [93mfurther[0m [93mconfirming[0m the [93mgreat[0m [93madvance[0m of the [93mintratumoral[0m [93msynthetic[0m [93mtherapeutic[0m [92msystem[0m [93mactivated[0m by [93mNIR[0m-[93mI[0m [93mlight[0m for [93mhypoxic[0m [93mtumor[0m [93mtherapy[0m. This [93mwork[0m [93moffers[0m [93mnew[0m [91mpathway[0m for [93mdeveloping[0m a [93mpotent[0m [93mphototherapy[0m [92mmodel[0m.
